title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio site built with React, Vite, and Framer Motion to showcase my work, skills, and aesthetic. Fully responsive with custom animations.

title: GIF Finder
description: A lightweight web app that uses the GIPHY API to search and display trending or keyword-based GIFs. Built with JavaScript and React Hooks for smooth UI updates.

title: Audio Visualizer
description: A responsive browser-based visualizer that turns audio input into dynamic waveforms and colorful animations using the Web Audio API and Canvas.

title: Fish Tank
description: A cozy aquarium sim where players can feed and watch fish interact. Developed with Unity, featuring dynamic movement and underwater ambiance as well as hand drawn sprites

title: HedgeBall
description: A 3D puzzle game where players must rotate a maze in order to move a ball to its destination before the time runs out. Designed during a game jam using Unity and C#, receiving 1st place.
